name: Next Color!
description:
Use your finger to guide the ball and go as far as you can! Game play is easy, touch only the boxes with the same color as the ball. Beware the ball changes color!

A multitude of one player challenges!

It is very easy to play, but way more complicated to beat the best scores. Challenge your friends!

Features:

- Free
- Easy and fun
- Challenge your friends
- Bonuses
- Custom Challenges
